scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
scripts.clean:reports: rm -R -f cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.e2e:local: npm run pretest && npm run cy:run:e2e:local && npm run posttest
scripts.e2e:dev: npm run pretest && npm run cy:run:e2e:dev && npm run posttest
scripts.e2e:stage: npm run pretest && npm run cy:run:e2e:stage && npm run posttest
scripts.api:local: npm run pretest && npm run cy:run:api:local && npm run posttest
scripts.api:dev: npm run pretest && npm run cy:run:api:dev && npm run posttest
scripts.api:stage: npm run pretest && npm run cy:run:api:stage && npm run posttest
scripts.cy:parallel:e2e:local: cypress-parallel -s cy:run -t 2 -d cypress/integration/tests/e2e/ -a '"--config-file cypress-local.json --browser chrome"' -r mochawesome
scripts.cy:parallel:e2e:dev: cypress-parallel -s cy:run -t 2 -d cypress/integration/tests/e2e/ -a '"--config-file cypress-dev.json --browser chrome"' -r mochawesome
scripts.cy:parallel:e2e:stage: cypress-parallel -s cy:run -t 2 -d cypress/integration/tests/e2e/ -a '"--config-file cypress-dev.json --browser chrome"' -r mochawesome
